LUMSI - Payment terms - Lump sum plus instalments
Payment terms - Lump sum plus instalments. Lump sum amount: £100.00. Instalment amount: £234.00 to be paid monthly from 11/04/2025.

judicialResults.label: Imprisonment
judicialResults.resultText:
IMP - Imprisonment
Committed to prison for 8 Years. Reason: failure to comply with requirements of post custodial sentence supervision because of an unprovoked attack of a serious nature, because the defendant has a flagrant disregard for court orders. Bail remand days to count (Tagged Days): 45. Total custodial period: 9 Years.
